document_data.name: Gudea
document_data.mainbody: '''Gudea''' was the ruler of [[Ssintar]] in [[Unther]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Gudea was a supporter of [[Gilgeam]]. However, like many, he hid from the king when the situation was desperate. He was bargaining with [[Furifax]] and the cult of [[Tiamat]] in order to survive.
document_data.Personality: Gudea was a natural pessimist, always figuring the worst scenarios. He had no ambitions to take power.
